lexUnit.name: expert.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who is very knowledgeable about or skilful in a particular area

sentence.text: An expert at crisis management : Mr Morton 's penchant for rows is one of his hallmarks : Jeremy Warner looks at the man entrusted with the spadework of the tunnel project
